Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: These days people are all talking about the state of the Australian economy with many different issues cropping up in headlines. From surcharges on imports and exports to potential property taxes and concerns about inflation it seems there's no end to the financial woes facing Australian citizens. Many experts are calling for action to be taken around the tax system but with the Reserve Bank currently considering potential interest rate changes it's unclear what the future holds. Amidst all the uncertainty however one potential solution has emerged: the build-to-rent movement with a new $1 billion fund dedicated to affordable housing.
